title: The Rarity Of Pure Devotional Service | HH Stoka Krishna Swami | ISKCON Bangalore
speaker: HH Stoka Krishna Swami

segments.text: According to his wish and will, living entities are wandering all over the universe.
This Brahmanda Brahmana wandering all over the universe is going on.
But Narada Muni is not subject to Brahmanda Brahmana by force of the material nature.
He travels, he goes from one place to another, simply because he is preaching pure devotional service.
And Narada Muni doesn't find easily candidates who will readily accept his preaching.
It's ironical that the residents of those upper planetary systems are situated in mode of goodness,
predominantly.
So they are situated in knowledge, they are situated in detachment.
Still, because they are bereft of pure devotional service,
they cannot recognize Narada Muni's actual situation.
So they are attached to either the process of karma, jnana or tapasya.
But it is very...
very rare to find somebody who has accepted the path of pure devotional service.
Even among them, those who accept the path of devotion, their devotion generally is mixed devotion.
It is very, very, very, very rare to find among these Vishnu Bhaktas in the upper planetary systems,
one pure devotee of the Supreme Lord Vishnu.
One pure devotee of the Supreme Lord Vishnu.
One pure devotee of the Supreme Lord Vishnu.
One pure devotee of the Supreme Lord Vishnu.
How rare?
Bhagavatam it is declared.
Muktanam api siddhanam mukta siddha purusha.
Mukta means liberated souls.
They are materially detached.
They don't have any desire for material enjoyment in this world.
Siddhanam, those who are perfected beings, they have completely controlled their senses
and they engage their senses in...
exclusively in the...
business of self-realization.
Such siddha purushas, among them, Muktanam api siddhanam Narayana parayana sudurlabha.
Among them, to find one Narayana parayana, one pure devotee, is sudurlabha.
Durlabha means very difficult to find.
Sudurlabha means most difficult to find.
Almost impossible.
And among how many...
Mukta purushas and siddha purushas, is it difficult to find one Narayana parayana?
Kotishvapi mahamune kotishu, crores, millions.
But even if you were to search among millions of Mukta purushas and siddha purushas, to find
one Narayana parayana is very, very, very rare.
